content:
As an MVP Gold member, you'll indeed enjoy some fantastic perks on your flight from LAX to HNL on AS142, including:

1. **Priority Boarding**: As an MVP Gold member, you'll receive priority boarding, which means you'll be among the first to board the plane. This perk will give you more time to settle in, stow your carry-on bags, and get comfortable before takeoff.
2. **Extra Baggage Allowance**: As an MVP Gold member, you're entitled to two free checked bags (up to 70 lbs each), which can be a significant cost savings. This perk can be especially useful if you're planning to bring back some souvenirs from Hawaii or need to pack extra gear for your trip.

In addition to these perks, you'll also enjoy other MVP Gold benefits, such as:

* **Priority Check-in and Bag Drop**: You'll have access to dedicated check-in and bag drop lines, which can save you time and hassle at the airport.
* **Upgrades**: You'll have a higher priority for upgrades to First Class or Premium Class, depending on availability.
* **Complimentary Upgrades**: You might receive complimentary upgrades to First Class or Premium Class, depending on availability.

To ensure you receive these perks, make sure to log in to your Alaska Airlines account and add your MVP Gold membership number to your booking. You can do this during the booking process or by visiting the "My Trips" section of the Alaska Airlines website.

Once you've added your MVP Gold membership number, you should see your priority boarding and extra baggage allowance reflected in your booking details.

Enjoy your flight from LAX to HNL on AS142, and happy travels to Hawaii!
